  • Contact
  • Welcome to Delta Professional Services

The Premier Flight Training
& Standards Company

Choose your Experience

Who We Serve

As the Premier Flight Training & Standards expert, DPS serves the aviation community in three ways:

  • Aspiring Professional Pilots

    Are you building flight time to transition to a career as a professional pilot? At DPS, we offer the premier FAA-certified Airline Transport Pilot Certification Training Program (ATP-CTP). Join us on the Delta Air Lines campus in Atlanta, GA to experience airline training and get a behind–the–scenes look into airline operations–not available to the public.

    Explore ATP-CTP Training Options

  • Retiring/Retired Airline Pilots

    Your journey doesn’t end with retirement. At DPS, you can share your decades of aviation experience by training the next generation of pilots as a flight simulator instructor or through additional airline support opportunities. With flexible scheduling, competitive benefits, and travel perks, we offer a fulfilling post-retirement career where your expertise is valued.

    Becoming a DPS Instructor

  • Businesses Seeking Flight Training Solutions

    Need to supplement and elevate your organization’s training and standards? With over 400 instructors experienced across multiple aircraft types, DPS provides scalable solutions from instructor services to simulator rentals. Our customized approach and portfolio of services ensure your pilots receive the highest quality training and support tailored to your needs. 

    See Our Corporate Solutions

World-Class Pilots. First-Class Flight Training.

At Delta Professional Services (DPS), we are committed to shaping the future of aviation through world-class flight training and standards solutions.

Industry-Leading Experience

Trusted by Pilots and Airlines for Over 20 Years

Whether you’re a pilot looking to begin or continue your career, or a company in need of top-tier aviation training & support, DPS has the experience, resources, and commitment to help you reach new heights. As a wholly-owned subsidiary of Delta Air Lines, we’ve been trusted by major airlines, manufacturers, and aspiring pilots for over 20 years to deliver unparalleled expertise in aviation training. 

Learn More

The DPS Difference

Why Choose DPS?

At DPS, we don’t just meet the standard—we raise it. Whether you’re charting the next phase of your aviation career or looking to enhance your company’s pilot training programs, we’re here to support your journey.

Industry-Leading Instructors

With an average of 30+ years of Part 121 flying experience, our team ensures that your pilots receive expert instruction.

Advanced Training Facilities

From our FAA Part 142 Delta Aircrew Training Center to cutting-edge flight training devices, we offer a premier training environment.

Proven Track Record

Trusted by Delta Air Lines, FedEx, Boeing, and other major aviation companies, DPS is the gold standard in aviation training.

Learn more about us

Want to Connect?

DPS is here and ready to help.

Fill out the form below, and one of our experts will be in touch.
